leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 物理仿真-CFD 求解器与湍流生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 网格→求解→模型→后处理→验证→UQ

queries: [WEB] RANS turbulence modeling source code github

tools.name: Basilisk
tools.one_line_profile: Astrodynamics simulation framework for spacecraft
tools.detailed_description: A modular and flexible astrodynamics simulation framework capable of simulating complex spacecraft dynamics and control systems. It is designed for both academic research and industrial applications in astrodynamics.

tools.name: bsk_rl
tools.one_line_profile: Reinforcement learning environments for spacecraft autonomy
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit built on top of the Basilisk framework to provide reinforcement learning environments for researching spacecraft autonomy and control strategies.

tools.name: DLBFoam
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic load balancing library for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: An open-source dynamic load balancing model designed for fast reacting flow simulations in OpenFOAM, improving parallel performance for multiphase or reacting flows.

tools.name: flowTorch
tools.one_line_profile: Library for analysis and reduced-order modeling of fluid flows
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for the analysis and creation of reduced-order models (ROMs) for fluid flow simulations, leveraging PyTorch for data-driven approaches.

tools.name: pimpleTKEBudgetFoam
tools.one_line_profile: OpenFOAM solver for runtime turbulence budget analysis
tools.detailed_description: An OpenFOAM solver designed to calculate resolved Reynolds stress, turbulent kinetic energy (TKE), and dissipation rate budgets at runtime during Large Eddy Simulations (LES).

tools.name: sdfibm
tools.one_line_profile: Immersed boundary method solver using signed distance fields
tools.detailed_description: A CFD solver framework combining the Immersed Boundary Method (IBM) with Signed Distance Fields (SDF) within OpenFOAM, enabling simulation of complex geometries.

tools.name: ClimaAtmos.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Atmosphere model with data assimilation and ML integration
tools.detailed_description: A Julia-based atmospheric model designed to leverage data assimilation and machine learning tools for modeling and calibrating subgrid-scale processes in climate science.

tools.name: LESbrary.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Library for generating Oceananigans LES data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating and managing Large Eddy Simulation (LES) datasets using Oceananigans.jl, primarily used for calibrating parameterizations in climate models.

tools.name: TurbulenceConvection.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Turbulence-convection single column model
tools.detailed_description: A single column model (SCM) for parameterizing turbulence and convection in atmospheric simulations, developed as part of the CliMA ecosystem.

tools.name: BG_Flood
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated shallow water hydrodynamics solver
tools.detailed_description: A numerical model for simulating shallow water hydrodynamics (river, storm surge, tsunami) on GPUs using an Adaptive Mesh Refinement type grid.

tools.name: Dedalus
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible framework for solving PDEs with spectral methods
tools.detailed_description: A general-purpose framework for solving partial differential equations (PDEs) using modern spectral methods, widely used in fluid dynamics and astrophysics.

tools.name: Eigentools
tools.one_line_profile: Eigenvalue analysis tools for Dedalus
tools.detailed_description: A companion package for the Dedalus PDE solver framework, providing tools for eigenvalue analysis and stability studies of fluid systems.

tools.name: pde-dataset-generator
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for generating PDE ground truth datasets
tools.detailed_description: A utility for generating ground truth datasets for Partial Differential Equations (PDEs) using solvers like ARCSim, FEniCS, and SU2, aimed at training ML models.

tools.name: HELYX-OS
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source GUI for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface (GUI) for OpenFOAM, designed to simplify the setup and execution of CFD simulations.

tools.name: Nalu-Wind
tools.one_line_profile: Exascale-ready solver for wind farm CFD simulations
tools.detailed_description: A generalized unstructured massively parallel low Mach number flow solver designed for wind farm simulations, targeting exascale computational platforms.

tools.name: RANS_Channel
tools.one_line_profile: RANS solver for turbulent channel flow
tools.detailed_description: A code that solves Reynolds-Averaged Navier-Stokes (RANS) equations for fully developed turbulent channel flow with variable fluid properties.

tools.name: RANS_pipe
tools.one_line_profile: RANS solver for turbulent pipe flow with heat transfer
tools.detailed_description: A RANS code designed to solve turbulent pipe flow problems involving fluids undergoing heat transfer at supercritical pressures.

tools.name: hybridPorousInterFoam
tools.one_line_profile: OpenFOAM solver for hybrid-scale porous media flows
tools.detailed_description: An OpenFOAM solver developed for performing single- and two-phase flow simulations within hybrid-scale porous media environments.

tools.name: PyFrac
tools.one_line_profile: Planar 3D hydraulic fracture growth solver
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based solver for simulating planar 3D hydraulic fracture growth, useful in geo-energy and fracture mechanics applications.

tools.name: Channel3d
tools.one_line_profile: High-order DNS solver for channel flow
tools.detailed_description: A second-/fourth-order finite-difference Direct Numerical Simulation (DNS) solver featuring versatile viscous treatments for channel flow simulations.

tools.name: HiFiLES
tools.one_line_profile: High Fidelity Large Eddy Simulation Solver
tools.detailed_description: An open-source, high-order, compressible flow solver for unstructured grids, designed for Large Eddy Simulation (LES) on GPU architectures.

tools.name: ITHACA-FV
tools.one_line_profile: Reduced Order Modelling for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Reduced Order Modelling (ROM) techniques specifically for OpenFOAM, enabling faster simulations through model reduction.

tools.name: KTH_Framework
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox framework for Nek5000 CFD solver
tools.detailed_description: A framework containing various toolboxes and utilities developed for the Nek5000 spectral element CFD solver.

tools.name: ReynoldsStressTurbulenceModels
tools.one_line_profile: Reynolds stress turbulence closure models library
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Reynolds stress turbulence closure models that go beyond the Boussinesq approximation for CFD simulations.

tools.name: DRDMannTurb
tools.one_line_profile: Data-driven synthetic turbulence generation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for data-driven synthetic turbulence generation based on the Mann model, used for generating turbulent inflow conditions.

tools.name: wuFoil
tools.one_line_profile: Airfoil modelling, meshing, and analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: An all-in-one tool for airfoil modelling, meshing, analysis, and optimization, with support for gmsh, SU2, and xfoil.

tools.name: DrivAerNet
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale car aerodynamics dataset and benchmark
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale multimodal car dataset including Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) simulations and deep learning benchmarks for aerodynamic prediction.

tools.name: TurbulenceInflowTool
tools.one_line_profile: Turbulent inflow input generator for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A tool to add input definitions for turbulent inflow models to OpenFOAM simulation files, facilitating boundary condition setup.

tools.name: Nalu
tools.one_line_profile: Generalized unstructured massively parallel low Mach flow solver
tools.detailed_description: Nalu is a generalized unstructured massively parallel low Mach flow code designed to support a variety of open applications of interest, built on the Sierra Toolkit and Trilinos solver stack.

tools.name: Nek5000
tools.one_line_profile: High-fidelity spectral element CFD solver
tools.detailed_description: Nek5000 is a spectral element CFD code designed for high-fidelity simulation of unsteady incompressible fluid flow with thermal and passive scalar transport.

tools.name: NekROM
tools.one_line_profile: Model-Order Reduction Framework for Nek5000
tools.detailed_description: NekROM is a framework for developing and running reduced order models (ROM) specifically designed for the Nek5000 spectral element CFD solver.

tools.name: Nekbone
tools.one_line_profile: Proxy application for Nek5000 performance benchmarking
tools.detailed_description: Nekbone is a mini-app derived from Nek5000, capturing the basic structure and user interface of the extensive Nek5000 software, used primarily for HPC benchmarking and solver optimization research.

tools.name: AT-DDPM
tools.one_line_profile: Atmospheric turbulence mitigation using Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic Models
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for restoring images degraded by atmospheric turbulence using Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic Models (DDPM).

tools.name: Breeze.jl
tools.one_line_profile: LES-to-mesoscale atmosphere simulation tool
tools.detailed_description: Breeze.jl is a Julia-based tool for limited area Large-Eddy Simulation (LES) to mesoscale atmosphere simulations, built upon Oceananigans.

tools.name: OpenFOAM-1.7.x
tools.one_line_profile: Open source CFD toolbox (Version 1.7.x)
tools.detailed_description: Legacy version (1.7.x) of the OpenFOAM open source CFD toolbox, providing solvers and utilities for continuum mechanics problems.

tools.name: OpenFOAM-10
tools.one_line_profile: Open source CFD toolbox (Version 10)
tools.detailed_description: Version 10 of the OpenFOAM Foundation release, a comprehensive C++ library for Computational Fluid Dynamics.

tools.name: OpenFOAM-2.2.x
tools.one_line_profile: Open source CFD toolbox (Version 2.2.x)
tools.detailed_description: Patch version of OpenFOAM-2.2, a programmable software tool for Computational Fluid Dynamics.

tools.name: OpenFOAM-2.3.x
tools.one_line_profile: Open source CFD toolbox (Version 2.3.x)
tools.detailed_description: Patch version of OpenFOAM-2.3, a programmable software tool for Computational Fluid Dynamics.

tools.name: OpenFOAM-4.x
tools.one_line_profile: Open source CFD toolbox (Version 4.x)
tools.detailed_description: Patch version of OpenFOAM-4, a programmable software tool for Computational Fluid Dynamics.

tools.name: OpenFOAM-5.x
tools.one_line_profile: Open source CFD toolbox (Version 5.x)
tools.detailed_description: Patch version of OpenFOAM-5, a programmable software tool for Computational Fluid Dynamics.

tools.name: OpenFOAM-6
tools.one_line_profile: Open source CFD toolbox (Version 6)
tools.detailed_description: Version 6 of the OpenFOAM Foundation release, a programmable software tool for Computational Fluid Dynamics.

tools.name: OpenFOAM-7
tools.one_line_profile: Open source CFD toolbox (Version 7)
tools.detailed_description: Version 7 of the OpenFOAM Foundation release, a programmable software tool for Computational Fluid Dynamics.

tools.name: OpenFOAM-8
tools.one_line_profile: Open source CFD toolbox (Version 8)
tools.detailed_description: Version 8 of the OpenFOAM Foundation release, a programmable software tool for Computational Fluid Dynamics.

tools.name: OpenFOAM-9
tools.one_line_profile: Open source CFD toolbox (Version 9)
tools.detailed_description: Version 9 of the OpenFOAM Foundation release, a programmable software tool for Computational Fluid Dynamics.

tools.name: OpenFOAM-dev
tools.one_line_profile: Open source CFD toolbox (Development Version)
tools.detailed_description: Development repository for the OpenFOAM Foundation release, containing the latest features and updates for the CFD solver.

tools.name: su2fmt
tools.one_line_profile: SU2 mesh format parser and visualizer
tools.detailed_description: An open source Python tool for parsing and visualizing SU2 mesh formats, facilitating pre-processing and inspection of CFD meshes.

tools.name: TurbOPark
tools.one_line_profile: Turbulence Optimized Park model for wind farms
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based Turbulence Optimized Park model for simulating and optimizing wind farm layouts considering turbulence effects.

tools.name: PyFR
tools.one_line_profile: Python-based high-order CFD solver
tools.detailed_description: PyFR is an open-source Python based framework for solving advection-diffusion type problems on streaming architectures using the Flux Reconstruction approach of Huynh.

tools.name: PINN_SA
tools.one_line_profile: Spalart-Allmaras Turbulence Model with PINNs
tools.detailed_description: A research tool implementing the Spalart-Allmaras turbulence model using Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) for mean flow reconstruction.

tools.name: ML_2D_Turbulence
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning closures for Kraichnan turbulence
tools.detailed_description: A codebase providing Large Eddy Simulation (LES) machine learning closures specifically for 2D Kraichnan turbulence modeling.

tools.name: Deep-Learning-for-Aerodynamic-Prediction
tools.one_line_profile: Deep neural network for aerodynamic prediction over airfoils
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool designed to replicate RANS solver results for predicting aerodynamic properties over airfoils.

tools.name: SciBlend
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific data visualization workflows for Blender
tools.detailed_description: SciBlend enables advanced scientific data visualization workflows directly within Blender, allowing researchers to render high-quality visualizations of simulation data.

tools.name: sedfoam
tools.one_line_profile: Two-phase flow sediment transport solver for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: SedFoam is a specialized solver built on the OpenFOAM toolbox for simulating two-phase flow and sediment transport.

tools.name: RapidCFD-dev
tools.one_line_profile: CUDA-accelerated OpenFOAM fork
tools.detailed_description: RapidCFD is a fork of OpenFOAM designed to run fully on CUDA platforms, enabling GPU acceleration for CFD simulations.

tools.name: diffusion-lagr
tools.one_line_profile: Synthetic Lagrangian Turbulence generation via Diffusion Models
tools.detailed_description: A generative AI tool using diffusion models to synthesize Lagrangian turbulence data.

tools.name: ghost-cell-IBM
tools.one_line_profile: Ghost cell immersed boundary method for Basilisk
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the ghost cell immersed boundary method (IBM) specifically for the Basilisk CFD solver.

tools.name: LESnets
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed neural operator for LES turbulence
tools.detailed_description: LESnets is a physics-informed neural operator designed for Large-Eddy Simulation (LES) of turbulence.

tools.name: foam-extend-3.1
tools.one_line_profile: Community driven fork of OpenFOAM (Version 3.1)
tools.detailed_description: A mirror of the foam-extend-3.1 project, a community-driven fork of OpenFOAM with additional features and physics models.

tools.name: TurbNet
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-inspired transformer for atmospheric turbulence mitigation
tools.detailed_description: A physics-inspired transformer model for single-frame atmospheric turbulence mitigation in imaging.

tools.name: WENO-OF/WENOEXT
tools.one_line_profile: Weighted Essentially Non-Oscillatory (WENO) schemes library for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing high-order Weighted Essentially Non-Oscillatory (WENO) numerical schemes within the OpenFOAM framework, designed to improve shock-capturing capabilities in CFD simulations.

tools.name: pyFrame3DD
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for Frame3DD structural analysis software
tools.detailed_description: Python interface for Frame3DD, enabling static and dynamic structural analysis of 2D and 3D frames and trusses with elastic and geometric stiffness.

tools.name: miniSMC
tools.one_line_profile: DNS solver for compressible viscous multi-component reacting flows
tools.detailed_description: A Direct Numerical Simulation (DNS) code designed to solve compressible Navier-Stokes equations specifically for viscous multi-component reacting flows.

tools.name: NekIBM
tools.one_line_profile: Immersed Boundary Method platform based on Nek5000
tools.detailed_description: A multiphase flow simulation platform utilizing the Direct-forced Immersed Boundary Method, built upon the spectral element solver Nek5000.

tools.name: reactingDNS_OpenFOAM
tools.one_line_profile: Reacting flow DNS solver extension for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: An enhancement to the OpenFOAM reactingFoam solver, incorporating detailed transport properties for direct numerical simulation (DNS) of multi-component reacting flows.

tools.name: flameletSMOKE
tools.one_line_profile: Laminar flamelet model solver for turbulent non-premixed flames
tools.detailed_description: A CFD solver designed for simulating turbulent non-premixed flames using the steady laminar flamelet model, likely integrated with OpenSMOKE++ libraries.

tools.name: PythonFOAM
tools.one_line_profile: In-situ data analysis and ML integration for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A library enabling in-situ data analysis and machine learning integration within OpenFOAM simulations using Python, developed by Argonne National Laboratory.

tools.name: TensorFlowFoam
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow C-API integration for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A framework integrating the TensorFlow C-API into OpenFOAM, allowing for data-driven CFD algorithm development and direct execution of ML models within the solver.

tools.name: pyfrost
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for Bifrost compacted colored de Bruijn Graph
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing bindings for the Bifrost C++ library, enabling the construction, manipulation, and querying of compacted colored de Bruijn graphs for genomic analysis.

tools.name: FLOWVPM.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Meshless Large Eddy Simulation via Vortex Particle Method
tools.detailed_description: A Julia-based meshless Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) solver implementing the reformulated Vortex Particle Method (VPM) for Large Eddy Simulation (LES) of aerodynamic flows.

tools.name: TrioCFD
tools.one_line_profile: TRUST platform based CFD code for LES and RANS simulations
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) code built on the TRUST platform, featuring Front-Tracking, Radiation, ALE for fluid-structure interactions, and turbulence models (LES & RANS).

tools.name: Nektar++
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral/hp element framework for CFD (Mirror)
tools.detailed_description: A spectral/hp element framework designed to support the construction of efficient high-performance scalable solvers for partial differential equations, particularly in CFD.

tools.name: CEASIOMpy
tools.one_line_profile: Conceptual aircraft design environment wrapping CFD and FEM tools
tools.detailed_description: CEASIOMpy is a conceptual aircraft design environment that integrates various tools for aerodynamics (CFD) and structural analysis, enabling automated design workflows and optimization.

tools.name: GMSH-Airfoil-2D
tools.one_line_profile: Automated 2D mesh generator for airfoils using Gmsh
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to generate 2D structured or unstructured meshes around airfoils for CFD simulations, leveraging the Gmsh API.

tools.name: rans-uncertainty
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification framework for RANS turbulence modeling
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library for quantifying uncertainty in data-driven Reynolds-Averaged Navier-Stokes (RANS) turbulence modeling, specifically focusing on model form uncertainty.

tools.name: SCAMPy
tools.one_line_profile: Single Column Atmospheric Model in Python
tools.detailed_description: A single column model (SCM) for simulating atmospheric boundary layer turbulence and clouds, used for research in atmospheric physics and parameterization development.

tools.name: code_saturne
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source general purpose CFD solver
tools.detailed_description: A general-purpose Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) software developed by EDF, capable of handling incompressible and compressible flows, turbulence, heat transfer, and combustion.

tools.name: classy_blocks
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for OpenFOAM blockMesh generation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that simplifies the creation of blockMesh dictionaries for OpenFOAM, allowing for parametric and object-oriented mesh generation.

tools.name: usv_sim_lsa
tools.one_line_profile: USV simulation environment with hydrodynamics
tools.detailed_description: A simulation package for Unmanned Surface Vehicles (USV) in Gazebo, incorporating environmental factors like water currents and winds, useful for hydrodynamic and control research.

tools.name: wirehexmesher
tools.one_line_profile: Wire-wrap mesh generator for Nek5000
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB tool specifically designed to create wire-wrap meshes for the Nek5000 spectral element CFD solver.

tools.name: pymech
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for Nek5000 and SIMSON data
tools.detailed_description: A Python software suite for interacting with, post-processing, and converting data formats for the Nek5000 and SIMSON CFD codes.

tools.name: hybridTurbulenceModel
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid URANS/LES turbulence modeling library
tools.detailed_description: A library and utilities for OpenFOAM implementing hybrid turbulence models that combine Unsteady RANS (URANS) and Large Eddy Simulation (LES) approaches via zonal isolation.

tools.name: BoundaryLayerDynamics.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Turbulence-resolving boundary layer simulation tool
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for performing Direct Numerical Simulation (DNS) and Large Eddy Simulation (LES) of turbulent boundary-layer flows.

tools.name: ENRICO
tools.one_line_profile: Exascale Nuclear Reactor Investigative Code
tools.detailed_description: A coupled physics code designed for exascale simulations of nuclear reactors, integrating neutronics and fluid dynamics (CFD).

tools.name: proteus-mprans
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-phase RANS module for Proteus
tools.detailed_description: A module within the Proteus toolkit for solving 3D, non-hydrostatic, turbulent, incompressible air/water flow using multi-phase RANS approaches.

tools.name: plotpal
tools.one_line_profile: Post-processing and plotting tool for Dedalus
tools.detailed_description: A set of post-processing tools designed to facilitate the plotting and visualization of simulation results generated by the Dedalus spectral solver.

tools.name: AeroelasticAirfoil-SU2
tools.one_line_profile: Aeroelastic simulation framework using SU2
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework that automates the generation of SU2 configuration files and execution of aeroelastic simulations for airfoils, including damping coefficient computation.

tools.name: PyFRep
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable F-Rep geometric modeling library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for functional representation (F-Rep) geometric modeling, supporting differentiable operations useful for shape optimization in physics and engineering contexts.

tools.name: amiet_tools
tools.one_line_profile: Turbulence-airfoil interaction noise prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python functions for predicting noise generated by turbulence-flat plate interaction using Amiet's analytical model, relevant for aeroacoustics.

tools.name: fluidfoam
tools.one_line_profile: OpenFoam post-processing Python library
tools.detailed_description: A Python package developed to perform post-processing of OpenFOAM CFD simulations, allowing for the manipulation and visualization of mesh and field data.

tools.name: rheoTool
tools.one_line_profile: OpenFOAM toolbox for viscoelastic and GNF fluid flows
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox based on OpenFOAM for simulating Generalized Newtonian Fluid (GNF) and viscoelastic fluid flows, extending the solver's capabilities for complex rheology.

tools.name: Xcompact3d
tools.one_line_profile: High-order Navier-Stokes solver for incompressible flows
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran-based solver for the incompressible Navier-Stokes equations using high-order compact finite difference schemes, designed for high-fidelity turbulence simulations.

tools.name: xcompact3d_toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Pre- and post-processing tools for XCompact3d
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox providing utilities for pre-processing (setup) and post-processing (analysis) of CFD simulations run with the XCompact3d solver.

tools.name: myTurbulenceModels
tools.one_line_profile: Additional turbulence models library for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A collection of supplementary turbulence models implemented for OpenFOAM, extending the standard library with additional closure models.

tools.name: Deep-Learning-Turbulence-model
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning based turbulence modeling tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool utilizing deep learning techniques to learn turbulence models from high-fidelity data, aiming to predict turbulent flows with reduced computational cost.

tools.name: foamlib
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for OpenFOAM interaction
tools.detailed_description: A modern Python package designed to facilitate interaction with OpenFOAM, enabling scripting and automation of CFD workflows.

tools.name: openfoam-app
tools.one_line_profile: Native OpenFOAM application bundle for macOS
tools.detailed_description: A distribution of OpenFOAM packaged as a native macOS application, simplifying installation and usage of the CFD solver on Apple platforms.

tools.name: dedaLES
tools.one_line_profile: Large Eddy Simulation implementation using Dedalus
tools.detailed_description: A framework for performing Large Eddy Simulations (LES) of turbulent flows utilizing the Dedalus spectral solver.

tools.name: GOTM
tools.one_line_profile: General Ocean Turbulence Model source code
tools.detailed_description: Source code for the General Ocean Turbulence Model (GOTM), a one-dimensional water column model for studying hydrodynamic and thermodynamic processes in marine and limnic waters.

tools.name: SU-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for SU(n) irreducible representations analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools for studying irreducible representations of SU(n) groups, including visualization of hadron flavor-state multiplets for particle physics.

tools.name: hyStrath
tools.one_line_profile: Hypersonic and rarefied gas dynamics simulation code
tools.detailed_description: A simulation code for hypersonic and rarefied gas dynamics, suitable for high-speed aerodynamics and non-equilibrium flow research.

tools.name: Wall-Models-for-LES
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB implementations of wall models for LES
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing MATLAB implementations of various wall models (equilibrium and integral) for Large Eddy Simulation (LES) of incompressible flows, including spectral implementations.

tools.name: PFC3D_OpenFOAM
tools.one_line_profile: Coupling interface for PFC3D and OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A tool for coupling Itasca's PFC3D (Particle Flow Code) with OpenFOAM to perform fluid-particle interaction modeling.

tools.name: CfdOF
tools.one_line_profile: OpenFOAM CFD workbench for FreeCAD
tools.detailed_description: A FreeCAD workbench that integrates OpenFOAM, allowing users to perform Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) simulations directly within the FreeCAD environment.

tools.name: LESS
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale remote sensing simulation framework
tools.detailed_description: A simulation framework for generating large-scale remote sensing data and images over heterogeneous 3D scenes, used for validating remote sensing models and algorithms.

tools.name: sqgturb
tools.one_line_profile: Surface quasi-geostrophic turbulence model
tools.detailed_description: Python codes for studying predictability and data assimilation using a surface quasi-geostrophic (SQG) turbulence model.

tools.name: cfd-bwb-airfoil-optimizer
tools.one_line_profile: Airfoil optimization workflow using SU2 and OpenMDAO
tools.detailed_description: A tool for optimizing airfoils for blended wing bodies using CFD analysis with SU2 solver and optimization algorithms provided by OpenMDAO.

tools.name: CoNFiLD
tools.one_line_profile: Conditional Neural Field Latent Diffusion Model for Turbulence
tools.detailed_description: A code repository for CoNFiLD, a deep learning model capable of generating spatiotemporal turbulence data using conditional neural fields and latent diffusion models.

tools.name: openInjMoldSim
tools.one_line_profile: Injection molding simulation solver for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: An open-source solver for OpenFOAM designed to simulate the injection molding process.

tools.name: pyFRF
tools.one_line_profile: Frequency Response Function analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for calculating and analyzing Frequency Response Functions (FRF), commonly used in structural dynamics and vibration analysis.

tools.name: butterfly
tools.one_line_profile: Python API for creating and running OpenFOAM cases
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that serves as an API for creating, configuring, and running OpenFOAM CFD simulations, often used in conjunction with parametric design tools.

tools.name: gammaReThetatSST
tools.one_line_profile: Correlation-based transition turbulence model for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the correlation-based gamma-ReTheta transition turbulence model (SST) for OpenFOAM, enabling simulation of laminar-turbulent transition.

tools.name: PyFRS
tools.one_line_profile: Multiband emission calculator for GRB/TDE jets
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to compute the multiband emissions from Forward-Reverse Shocks of a Gamma-Ray Burst (GRB) or Tidal Disruption Event (TDE) jet, aiding in astrophysical modeling of high-energy phenomena.

tools.name: lesgo
tools.one_line_profile: Large-Eddy Simulation (LES) framework for turbulence research
tools.detailed_description: A pseudo-spectral Large-Eddy Simulation (LES) framework developed by the Turbulence Research Group at Johns Hopkins University, designed for high-fidelity simulation of turbulent flows.

tools.name: TurbDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Generative diffusion model for 3D flow turbulence simulation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the TurbDiff generative turbulence model, capable of generating 3D flow simulations from zero, representing an AI4S approach to turbulence modeling.

tools.name: ADflow
tools.one_line_profile: Finite volume RANS solver for aerodynamic design optimization
tools.detailed_description: A finite volume RANS CFD solver specifically tailored for gradient-based aerodynamic design optimization, supporting multiblock structured meshes and overset meshes.

tools.name: DAFoam
tools.one_line_profile: Discrete Adjoint solver with OpenFOAM for design optimization
tools.detailed_description: An open-source derivative of OpenFOAM that implements the discrete adjoint method for high-fidelity multidisciplinary design optimization (MDO) in fluid dynamics.

tools.name: MachineLearningTurbulenceModels
tools.one_line_profile: Data-driven turbulence models for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing machine learning-driven turbulence models within the OpenFOAM framework, enabling the use of data-driven predictions for closure terms in CFD simulations.

tools.name: PhaseScreen
tools.one_line_profile: Phase screen models for deep turbulence characterization
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox providing phase screen models to characterize the effects of deep turbulence on long-distance laser beam propagation, useful in optical physics and atmospheric turbulence studies.

tools.name: Baram
tools.one_line_profile: User-friendly CFD platform based on OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: An integrated CFD platform that provides a user-friendly GUI and workflow for OpenFOAM solvers, aiming to make computational fluid dynamics accessible to a wider audience.

tools.name: pyFreeFem
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for FreeFem++ PDE solver
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides an interface to FreeFem++, allowing users to define and solve partial differential equations (PDEs) using the Finite Element Method within a Python environment.

tools.name: SNaC
tools.one_line_profile: Massively parallel multi-block DNS solver
tools.detailed_description: A multi-block solver designed for massively parallel Direct Numerical Simulations (DNS) of fluid flows, capable of handling complex geometries and high-fidelity turbulence resolution.

tools.name: kEpsilonSources
tools.one_line_profile: Modified k-Epsilon turbulence model for OpenFOAM with source term support
tools.detailed_description: A modified implementation of the k-Epsilon turbulence model for OpenFOAM that utilizes fvOptions to facilitate the addition of source terms, enhancing flexibility for specific CFD simulation requirements.

tools.name: kOmegaSSTLowRe
tools.one_line_profile: Low Reynolds number k-Omega SST turbulence model for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Low Reynolds number k-Omega Shear Stress Transport (SST) turbulence model specifically designed for OpenFOAM, enabling more accurate simulations of boundary layer flows.

tools.name: porousMultiphaseFoam
tools.one_line_profile: Porous multiphase flow solver toolbox for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox developed for OpenFOAM to simulate multiphase flows in porous media, providing specialized solvers and boundary conditions for complex hydrological or industrial porous flow problems.

tools.name: Sapsan
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning-based turbulence modeling framework for astrophysics
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning framework designed to model turbulence in astrophysical simulations, bridging the gap between high-fidelity simulations and lower-cost models.

tools.name: CreateFFD
tools.one_line_profile: Free-Form Deformation box generator for SU2
tools.detailed_description: A utility script to generate Free-Form Deformation (FFD) boxes for the SU2 CFD solver, facilitating shape optimization and mesh deformation tasks.

tools.name: openfoam-adapter
tools.one_line_profile: OpenFOAM adapter for the preCICE coupling library
tools.detailed_description: An adapter that connects the OpenFOAM CFD solver to the preCICE coupling library, enabling partitioned multi-physics simulations such as fluid-structure interaction (FSI) and conjugate heat transfer (CHT).

tools.name: preCICE
tools.one_line_profile: Coupling library for partitioned multi-physics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance coupling library for partitioned multi-physics and multi-scale simulations, supporting surface and volume coupling for fluid-structure interaction, conjugate heat transfer, and other coupled physics problems.

tools.name: su2-adapter
tools.one_line_profile: SU2 adapter for the preCICE coupling library
tools.detailed_description: An adapter enabling the SU2 CFD solver to communicate with other solvers via the preCICE coupling library for multi-physics simulations.

tools.name: CFDTool
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB-based CFD simulation toolbox
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox that provides an integrated environment for running CFD simulations using OpenFOAM and SU2 solvers, featuring a GUI for geometry, meshing, and solver setup.

tools.name: FEATool Multiphysics
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated multi-physics simulation platform for MATLAB
tools.detailed_description: A fully integrated multi-physics simulation platform for MATLAB that interfaces with solvers like FEniCS, OpenFOAM, and SU2, allowing for easy setup of FEA and CFD problems.

tools.name: ibwallfunction_OpenFOAM
tools.one_line_profile: Immersed boundary method with adaptive wall functions for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of an immersed boundary method (IBM) coupled with y+-adaptive wall functions for OpenFOAM, designed to accurately model wall shear stress in complex geometries.

tools.name: Cfd
tools.one_line_profile: Computational Fluid Dynamics workbench for FreeCAD
tools.detailed_description: A FreeCAD workbench that integrates OpenFOAM and FEniCS solvers, allowing users to perform CFD simulations directly within the FreeCAD environment.

tools.name: mini-wake
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of the Ainslie eddy viscosity wake model
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Python implementation of the Ainslie eddy viscosity wake model and associated sub-models, used for calculating wind turbine wake effects.

tools.name: multi-vector-simulator
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation tool for optimizing Local Energy Systems
tools.detailed_description: A tool for assessing and optimizing Local Energy Systems (LES) encompassing multiple energy vectors, developed for the E-LAND project.

tools.name: PointwiseAutoMesh
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic mesh generation script for Pointwise
tools.detailed_description: A Glyph script for the Pointwise meshing software that automates the generation of meshes for 2D airfoils, streamlining the pre-processing step for CFD.

tools.name: cerisse
tools.one_line_profile: High-order LES/DNS solver for compressible turbulent reactive flows
tools.detailed_description: A high-order computational fluid dynamics solver designed for Direct Numerical Simulation (DNS) and Large Eddy Simulation (LES) of compressible, turbulent, and reactive flows.

tools.name: Data_Driven_Symbolic_Regression
tools.one_line_profile: Symbolic regression for identifying turbulence models
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning tool using genetic programming and sparse regression to discover interpretable physical equations and LES subgrid-scale turbulence models from data.

tools.name: Physics_informed_GANs_turbulent_flows
tools.one_line_profile: GAN-based super-resolution for turbulent flow fields
tools.detailed_description: A Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) framework for super-resolving low-resolution turbulent flow fields (RANS/LES) into high-resolution (DNS) fields without solving Navier-Stokes equations numerically.

tools.name: OpenHyperFLOW2D
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel 2D compressible CFD code with RANS/URANS models
tools.detailed_description: A parallel (MPI/OpenMP/CUDA) CFD code for simulating 2D transient viscous compressible multicomponent reacting gas flows, featuring RANS and URANS turbulence models.

tools.name: LE-PDE
tools.one_line_profile: Latent Evolution of PDEs for accelerated simulation
tools.detailed_description: A framework that accelerates forward simulation and inverse optimization of Partial Differential Equations (PDEs) via latent global evolution, achieving significant speedups while maintaining accuracy.

tools.name: snek5000
tools.one_line_profile: Python framework for the Nek5000 CFD solver
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework designed to interface with the Nek5000 spectral element CFD solver, facilitating case setup, execution, and post-processing in a Pythonic workflow.

tools.name: spectralDNS
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral Navier-Stokes solver in Python for turbulence simulation
tools.detailed_description: A Python package containing spectral Navier-Stokes solvers and similar fluid dynamics solvers, typically used for Direct Numerical Simulation (DNS) of turbulent flows.

tools.name: SU2 MeshTools
tools.one_line_profile: Mesh manipulation utilities for the SU2 CFD suite
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools for generating, manipulating, and converting computational meshes specifically designed to work within the SU2 multiphysics simulation environment.

tools.name: SU2
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source suite for multiphysics simulation and design
tools.detailed_description: SU2 is a suite of open-source software tools written in C++ for the numerical solution of partial differential equations (PDE) and performing PDE-constrained optimization, widely used for CFD and aerodynamic shape design.

tools.name: hw2d
tools.one_line_profile: Reference implementation for the Hasegawa-Wakatani plasma turbulence model
tools.detailed_description: A Python reference implementation for the Hasegawa-Wakatani model, used for simulating plasma turbulence in two dimensions, relevant for nuclear fusion reactor studies.

tools.name: libWallModelledLES
tools.one_line_profile: OpenFOAM library for wall-modelled Large-Eddy Simulation
tools.detailed_description: A library extension for OpenFOAM that implements wall-modelled Large-Eddy Simulation (WMLES) capabilities, providing specialized boundary conditions and turbulence models.

tools.name: PhiFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable PDE solving framework for machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable PDE solving framework built for machine learning applications, enabling the simulation of fluid dynamics and other physical systems within deep learning pipelines.

tools.name: turbinesFoam
tools.one_line_profile: Actuator line modeling extension for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: An extension library for OpenFOAM that implements actuator line modeling, primarily used for simulating wind turbines and their wake turbulence.

tools.name: hybridCentralSolvers
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of hybrid central solvers for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A collection of solvers for OpenFOAM based on hybrid central schemes, supporting one-phase, two-phase, and multicomponent compressible flows.

tools.name: libAcoustics
tools.one_line_profile: OpenFOAM library for far-field noise computation
tools.detailed_description: An OpenFOAM library designed for computing far-field noise and acoustics based on CFD simulation results.

tools.name: DRLinFluids
tools.one_line_profile: Platform coupling Deep Reinforcement Learning and OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python platform that couples Deep Reinforcement Learning (DRL) algorithms with OpenFOAM for flow control and shape optimization tasks.

tools.name: perturbU
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for initializing turbulent fields for LES simulations in OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A collection of utilities designed to generate initial turbulent fields for Large Eddy Simulations (LES) within the OpenFOAM environment, aiding in the setup of CFD simulations.

tools.name: wallShearStressLES
tools.one_line_profile: OpenFOAM utility for calculating wall shear stress in LES simulations
tools.detailed_description: A post-processing utility adapted for OpenFOAM to calculate wall shear stress specifically for Large Eddy Simulation (LES) cases, addressing specific turbulence modeling needs.

tools.name: hybridFoam
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid LES/RANS solver for OpenFOAM implementing a consistent dual-mesh framework
tools.detailed_description: A Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) solver that implements a hybrid Large Eddy Simulation (LES) and Reynolds-Averaged Navier-Stokes (RANS) approach on a dual-mesh framework for consistent turbulence modeling.

tools.name: para-database-for-PIML
tools.one_line_profile: DNS dataset of flows over periodic hills for data-driven turbulence modeling
tools.detailed_description: A Direct Numerical Simulation (DNS) database containing flow data over periodic hills with parameterized geometries, specifically designed to support Physics-Informed Machine Learning (PIML) research in turbulence modeling.

tools.name: turbulence-modeling-PIML
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed machine learning framework for data-driven Reynolds stress modeling
tools.detailed_description: A research framework and code collection for implementing data-driven Reynolds stress modeling using Physics-Informed Machine Learning (PIML) techniques, bridging CFD and machine learning.

tools.name: ofpp
tools.one_line_profile: Python parser to convert OpenFOAM output data into Numpy arrays
tools.detailed_description: OpenFOAM Python Parser (ofpp) is a library designed to parse data from OpenFOAM output files directly into Numpy arrays, facilitating data analysis and post-processing in Python environments.

tools.name: foamToNek
tools.one_line_profile: Conversion tool to translate OpenFOAM meshes to Nek5000 format
tools.detailed_description: A script-based tool designed to convert computational meshes from OpenFOAM format to Nek5000 format, enabling interoperability between these two major CFD solvers.

tools.name: turbulent-cfd
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated turbulent CFD solver using CUDA and Vulkan
tools.detailed_description: A standalone Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) solver capable of simulating turbulent flows, leveraging GPU acceleration through CUDA and Vulkan APIs for performance.

tools.name: dugksFoam
tools.one_line_profile: OpenFOAM solver for Boltzmann model equation using Discrete Unified Gas Kinetic Scheme
tools.detailed_description: An OpenFOAM-based solver implementing the Discrete Unified Gas Kinetic Scheme (DUGKS) for solving the Boltzmann model equation, suitable for multi-scale flow simulations.
